Reviews.Title: Bad Camera - do not buy
Reviews.Author: Shell
Reviews.Content: Pictures come out awful.  Fuzzy looking, way to dark. I've owned tons of camera's and this is the worst, never had this problem with any other camera.  Their return policy is ridicilous, do not buy!

Reviews.Title: Good Buy...
Reviews.Author: RONALD GRAYBEAL
Reviews.Content: Pentax a brand not advertised as heavily as some brands!! Have used Pentax film camera for 30+ years. RZ10 Wideangle to max. telephoto truly surprising......very good quality lens system!!

Reviews.Title: Great digital camera
Reviews.Author: JAN
Reviews.Content: I have had Pentax cameras for years. This is my third one. They are easy to use and take great photos. I love the bright color and the grip is coated in a rubberized finish making it easy to hold onto.

Reviews.Title: LOST MY MONEY
Reviews.Author: CATA
Reviews.Content: THE CAMERA IS PERFECT FOR A PRETTY DAY BUT IF YOU NEED TO TAKE A PICTURE INDOORS IT COMES OUT WITH A LOT OF "NOICE" ALSO THE FLASHLIGHT IS NOT ENOUGH TO TAKE A GOOD PICTURE AT NIGHT

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!!
Reviews.Author: RubyLi
Reviews.Content: I love it!!!!!!!!!Perfect color and great performance!worth the money!!! I love it a lot and have recommended to some of my friends.

ProductInfo.Features:
10x wide angle zoom lens (28-280mm); 14.1-megapixel CCD sensor
2.7-inch LCD screen; Pentax sensor shift Shake Reduction (SR) stabilization system
Widescreen 720p HD video at 30 frames per second
Automatic shooting modes including Pentax Auto Picture
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio RZ10 14 MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom with CCD Shift Stabilization and 2.7-Inch LCD (Lime)
